messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] A random offering
messages.msgSnippet: LOL I m a Christian and I got a kick out of it. It was pretty funny. But then, I haven t lost my sense of humor just because I found Christ. Beth Harriet
messages.messageBody:
LOL I'm a Christian and I got a kick out of it. It was pretty funny. But then, I haven't lost my sense of humor just because I found Christ.

Beth

Harriet Severino <severino42@...> wrote:
Hi,

I found this site a great, however I am irreverent about religion and
the bible. I was reffered to the site by a Unitatrian Universalist
intern minister with a great sense of humor. I have read a couple of
the stories, and had a good laugh.

> You may be interested in the, um, alternative presentation of
> Scripture at www.thebricktestament.com. Truly, God works in
mysterious > ways...

WARNING: People who are christian homeschoolers will probably not enjoy
it.

However, much of our society is based on christian beleifs, and I found
it a good way to present and discuss this material with my daughter,
without "teaching the bible".

Harriet Severino
Tutor
